reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 4-Pack CR2032 Lithium Coin Cell Battery has been a reliable choice for all my small electronic devices. Here's what stood out:1. **Longevity**: These batteries live up to their promise of long-lasting power. I've used them in various gadgets, and they've consistently outperformed other brands I've tried in the past.2. **Consistent Performance**: Each battery in the pack offers consistent voltage, ensuring my devices run smoothly and efficiently throughout the battery's lifespan.3. **Mercury-Free**: The fact that these are mercury-free gives me peace of mind about the environmental impact and safety for household use.4. **Value for Money**: Getting a 4-pack at such an affordable price, especially considering their performance, is a real bargain. It's clear that quality hasn't been compromised for cost.5. **Versatility**: The CR2032 size is perfect for a range of items, from remote controls to digital thermometers, making this pack a versatile addition to my battery stash.In summary, the Amazon Basics CR2032 Lithium Coin Cell Batteries have proven to be a stellar product. They offer top-notch performance, safety, and value. I'll definitely be sticking with these for all my CR2032 battery needs and highly recommend them to others in search of reliable and cost-effective batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I now get all my batteries from Amazon! These button batteries work great in my diabetes meter and blood pressure cuff. They last quite awhile. The price is very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a great price and works perfectly in my remote for Honda Insight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the prices, but they may not last as long as some other ones.
reviews.reviewText: These CR2032 batteries are a good price, reliable, and long-lasting. They can be used in Gameboy and Gameboy Color Pokémon game cartridges, Tile products, and car keys. However, it is difficult to determine how long they last and they are not suitable for devices that require batteries lasting longer than 2 weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Amazon batteries work well - I appreciate the prices. These batteries have worked in our things like scale nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The batteries got here quickly and were exactly what we needed. No problems with them at all! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We tried replacing the battery on our pups’ AirTags, but were running into issues where the new batteries didn’t seem compatible with them. We were about to give up & consider purchasing two new AirTags when someone suggested we try these Amazon batteries. We got them and they worked instantly! Now, I can relax knowing my fur babies are extra safe.

reviews.reviewText: Price is right and they work

reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable Power On Demand: Amazon Basics CR2032 Lithium Coin Cell Batteries
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 4 Pack CR2032 3 Volt Lithium Coin Cell Batteries have proven themselves to be an essential and dependable power source, and I'm thrilled to give them a perfect five-star rating. These batteries offer reliable performance, making them an excellent choice for a wide range of devices.Right from the start, the convenience of having a pack of four batteries is a game-changer. Whether it's for small electronics, remote controls, key fobs, or other devices that rely on coin cell batteries, this pack ensures that I always have a reliable power source on hand whenever I need it.The CR2032 batteries deliver consistent and stable power, which is crucial for the proper functioning of various gadgets. Whether I'm using them in a digital watch, a fitness tracker, or a remote control, I can trust that these batteries will power the device efficiently and consistently.The Amazon Basics brand is synonymous with quality and affordability, and these CR2032 batteries are no exception. Despite their budget-friendly price point, they deliver performance that matches or even exceeds that of more expensive options. This combination of value and reliability is truly impressive.The 3-volt lithium coin cell technology ensures a longer lifespan compared to traditional batteries. This means fewer battery replacements, resulting in both cost savings and reduced environmental impact. The long shelf life of these batteries makes them a smart choice for stocking up and having spares on hand.In conclusion, the Amazon Basics 4 Pack CR2032 3 Volt Lithium Coin Cell Batteries have earned their place as a five-star power solution for a variety of devices. Their consistent performance, value for money, and long-lasting power make them a must-have accessory for anyone who relies on small electronics in their daily life. If you're looking for reliable coin cell batteries that deliver consistent power at an affordable price, these Amazon Basics batteries are the perfect choice that easily deserves a five-star rating.
Excelente para no quedarme si. Pilas y economicas

These Amazon basics CR2023 batteries are a great value for a quality battery. This is the second time I have purchased them as I use the in my car fobs, kitchen scale and thermometer. You can buy cheaper batteries but, from my experience they never last long and lead to having to change them way too frequently. I would say that these amazon basics compare to Duracells in longevity and quality. Happy with the purchase.
Haciendo quedar bien a los Amazon basic, en esta línea son una buena opción.
